about_the_game:
After a long absence, you return to the City, right at the time of the famous Christmas Fair. But instead of smiles and cheer, there are gloomy faces and exorbitant prices for presents. Something is clearly wrong, and it's up to you to figure it out.And that might be harder than finding the Smiling Wizard's treasure! Arm yourself with magic dice, get to the truth and save Christmas!

✨ As always, all hope is on you. ✨

The adventure continues in the first DLC - The Blackest Friday. Where do the threads of a new conspiracy stretch?  Who wants to ruin Christmas? Win the favor of beautiful girls, fight new enemies, use your dice and spells to uncover the conspiracy and bring the holiday back to the City.

Dare and immerse yourself in the world of urban fantasy at the most wonderful time - Christmas.

⭐ A story of Christmas, magic, and sales.

⭐ Four girls with their own views, goals and desires

⭐ Hot animated sex scenes

⭐ New enemies and old friends

⭐ A whole new location, the Christmas Fair.

⭐ Christmas-themed quests

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game and this DLC are adults. The game and this DLC contains adult content including nudity and NSFW content.

The game and this DLC contains non-sexual violence (cartoon violence, fights, hypnosis), murders, depiction of criminal acts and positive depiction of criminal behavior, alcohol consumption and smoking, hints of drug use (weed), profanity and swearing.

The game and this DLC features nude girls, monster girls and animated H-scenes. The game contains adult material and scenes of a sexual nature with various fetishes that some viewers may find offensive: blowjob, titjob, vaginal, anal, creampie, BDSM, sex toys, straponing, threesome (MFF). All sex in the game and this DLC is consensual.

short_description: Awaken: The Blackest Friday - the adventure continues. Return to the City on Christmas Eve to take part in exciting adventures, meet old acquaintances and get to know them from a new side! Only you can save the holiday!
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
